body:
Hi @damianopezzotti,

I haven't tried yet to reproduce the issue, but I'm suspecting that the "any order" of the `containsExactlyInAnyOrderElementsOf` to be the culprit.

`containsExactlyInAnyOrderElementsOf` means we have to compare any elements of the actual list with any of the expected one, this leads to compare an `AppliedTotalExemptionResponse` to an `AppliedPartialExemptionResponse`, when doing so the reference for the fields available to be compared is `AppliedTotalExemptionResponse`, as it does not have a `value` field, and you have explicitly instructed the recursive comparison to look at `value`, it fails since https://github.com/assertj/assertj/issues/3129.

I don't see an easy workaround, I would try the following options, but they might not be viable for you:

- compare all fields, no check on compared fields
- instead of comparing some fields, ignore the ones you don't want to check

I'll try to reproduce the error time permitting, it's not that straightforward since we don't use lombok and would have to write the actual code instead.
@damianopezzotti would you have a chance to apply [delombok](https://projectlombok.org/features/delombok) to your reproducer?

Thanks @damianopezzotti, I debugged the test and it failed when comparing the `new AppliedTotalExemptionResponse( "E1", "E1 Desc", "T1" )` elements.

This is expected since we check the existence of compared fields and in this case, the `value` field does not.

The only way to get the previous behavior is to add an option to enable/disable the compared fields existence check.

rename.to: Allow to ignore check on compared fields in the recursive comparison (Problems on method 'usingRecursiveFieldByFieldElementComparatorOnFields')

rename.from: Allow to ignore check on compared fields in the recursive comparison (Problems on method 'usingRecursiveFieldByFieldElementComparatorOnFields')
rename.to: Allow to ignore check on compared fields in the recursive comparison (initial issue description was: Problems on method 'usingRecursiveFieldByFieldElementComparatorOnFields')

issue.title: Add option to ignore compared fields existence check

repository.name: assertj
repository.description: Fluent testing assertions for Java and the JVM
